text: @narendramodi Good evening sir. I'm a student from Goa. Going to answer my boards. Sir we are getting scared to answer our exams due to the covid-19 pandemic. In our state it is increasing. Sir we have a request can u push on the exams till the later month June 15. Thank you Sir.
